macros.sourceContext:
| | > |
{{domxref("HTMLOListElement.compact")}} {{deprecated_inline}}
^ |
|

A boolean value indicating that spacing between list items should be reduced. This property reflects the compact attribute only, it doesn't consider the {{cssxref("line-height")}} CSS property used for that behavior in modern pages.

title: HTMLOListElement
summary: The HTMLOListElement interface provides special properties (beyond those defined on the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating ordered list elements.
